long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Multiple Site Viewer: View Multiple Websites Side by Side

Tired of switching between tabs to view information from different websites? With Multiple Site Viewer, you can view, research, and explore several websites at once‚Äîall in one place. This tool makes it easy to compare content, get work done faster, and make informed decisions without the hassle of flipping between tabs.


Key Features:

üåê View Multiple Websites Side by Side: Open and compare multiple websites in a single browser tab. So, no more jumping from tab to tab.

üìñ Enhanced Readability: Adjust font size and line height to improve readability and make sure all the websites are easy on your eyes.

üîç Quick Access: Right-click on any page or link and select "Open this page in ResearchTools" for fast and convenient browsing.


Perfect For:

- Anyone who wants a simpler browsing experience
- Verifying facts from different sources
- Professionals analysing data from multiple websites
- Students conducting research
- Writers gathering ideas and sources
- News readers tracking stories from different outlets
- Bloggers comparing trends across different websites


How It Works:

This extension integrates with https://www.researchtools.site/search/ allowing you to view and compare multiple websites side by side with ease.
